Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating w/ delays after an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Garfield.
 
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
 
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 Eastbound Temporary  Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: 72 Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Clark and into the Terminal due to, street blockage near North Avenue Beach

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Clark and into the Terminal due to, street blockage near North Avenue Beach

Westbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
